# Risk Assessment of Potential Tourist-Vessel Collision with cetaceans in the Colombian EEZ.

This supplementary material contains the files and scripts that were used to develop the analysis of the research article entitled "Risk Assessment of Potential Tourist-Vessel Collision with cetaceans in the Colombian EEZ".



All the scripts and data used in this analysis are available at this GitHub repository. [https://github.com/ChrisBermudezR/Cetacean_Tourist_Vessel_Collision_Risk_Assessment](https://github.com/ChrisBermudezR/Cetacean_Tourist_Vessel_Collision_Risk_Assessment)
